title: Share of Medium Article Revenue: How to Know You Didn't Do A Good Job Explaining Your Startup
description:
Own a share of the revenue from this article: How to Know You Didn't Do A Good Job Explaining Your Startup 


 Revenue will be paid out monthly. 50% of the revenue from this article will be paid out to shareholders. 


 You also get a step by step walkthrough of what a Non-Fungible Token is and how one will be used to manage the ownership of this article.

title: 10% ownership of online course: Neurodiverse Entrepreneurs
description: Own 10% of the revenue stream from Neurodiverse Entrepreneurs

title: Test Group Membership for online course: Neurodiverse Entrepreneurs
description: Join the test group for Neurodiverse Entrepreneurs and claim your share of the 20% set aside for test group participants!
